name: Don Goodman

name: Kohei MATSUSHITA
title: Snr. Technology Evangelist
profile: He promotes the adoption of IoT through public speaking and writing, showcasing real-world use cases and hands-on demonstrations. After working in IT systems and e-commerce at a Linux server manufacturer, he began leading IoT business development in 2015, contributing to pioneering projects utilizing low-power connectivity and forming partnerships with major cloud providers. Since March 2017, he has held his current role, with over 700 speaking engagements to date. name: Aya Tokura
title: Program Manager
profile: With a background as a Technical Evangelist at Microsoft Japan and a former CTO of a startup, transitioned to IBM Japan in 2018 as a Senior Developer Advocate. Currently, leading several initiatives as a Program Manager in Customer Success team. Award: Forbes Japan's "Women in Tech 30" in 2024.

name: Michelle "MishManners" Duke
title: Developer Evangelist
profile:
Mish is a multi-talented personality in the tech and gaming communities. Mish has worked in the technology space for the last decade and has a tonne of experience in developer advocacy, community management, marketing, and content creation. Mish has spoken at over 380 events on topics like AI, the future of work, communication, teamwork, and have given technical demos. She's a respected leader in the hackathon community, having won, organised, and mentored over 100 hackathons.

Mish is a successful entrepreneur and founder, having co-founded several companies â€“ including an artificial intelligence company, and as a result, sits at the forefront of Melbourneâ€™s science, tech, esports, and startup scenes. In her 'spare' time sheâ€™s a streamer, journalist, loves playing sports, and is always working on something exciting.
